the Observer is a studentrun daily print  online newspaper serving Notre Dame Saint Marys  Holy Cross PERIOD Learn about us PERIOD

Danny Kinasz and Julian DiMelis  Tuesday March  

Maybe the most important sporting event of our generation occurred Sunday and just about no one noticed PERIOD Once in a lifetime the world is graced with the presence of an athlete that shifts the entire sporting landscape PERIOD Our world has been graced with two of these athletes PERIOD Rachel Alexandra and Curlin dominated the horse racing world like Alexander the Great dominated the known world PERIOD What do these two athletes with no equal do when they are retired from the days of competition They make babies PERIOD Thats right soon our world will be blessed with the lovechild of these two great race horses PERIOD No longer will Earth be called the Home of Humans but rather Earth will be referred to as Home of Super Curlin MegaAlexandra and a couple people PERIOD This got us thinking what if humans were to do this Imagine the possibilities PERIOD Albert Pujols and Jennie Finch Move over Cy Young and Barry Bonds we got a new record holder PERIOD LeBron James and Lisa Leslie Im thinking we have a 40time consecutive MVP coming PERIOD Roger Federer and Serena Williams Grand Slams would not even begin to describe their dominance PERIOD Tiger Woods and Annika Srenstam Future average  under par on a  par course Yeah thats  strokes on  holes PERIOD The possibilities are endless PERIOD Just think if we can have real Coke taste with zero calories then why isnt this possible PERIOD Were looking at you scientists PERIOD Until then I will refuse to watch these socalled greatest athletes in the world struggle with their weak genetic combinations PERIOD I want super athletes and I want them now PERIOD

Danny Kinasz

sophomore

Keough Hall

Mar PERIOD 

Julian DiMelis

sophomore

off campus

Mar PERIOD
